document_data.name: White Raven
document_data.mainbody: The '''White Raven''' was an [[elven]] patrol in [[Cormanthor]] until {{yearlink|241}}.
document_data.History: In the {{yearlinkName|241}}, the White Raven patrol, led by [[Iymbryl Alastrarra]],{{cite book/Elminster in Myth Drannor|99|4}} was completely eliminated by ''[[hobgoblin|ruukha (hobgoblins)]]''. Iymbryl, the last survivor, was rescued by [[Elminster Aumar]] but died of his wounds, bequeathing upon him the mission to return his ''[[kiira]]'' to his family in the city.
